text: Alberto Orzan (; 24 July 1931 – 9 August 2022) was an Italian footballer. He played as a defender. He played for the Italy national football team four times between 1956 to 1957. Orzan died on 9 August 2022 in Florence, Italy at the age of 91.Lutto, è scomparso l’ex difensore Alberto Orzan ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Footballers from Friuli- Venezia Giulia
title: Alberto Orzan
